long_description: The DAKINE Deluxe Tune Up kit features all the tools you need to keep your snowboard in top condition. Packed in a convenient carry case, this kit is perfect for both travel and at-home use. Multi-pocket case with zipper keeps all the parts together and organized; included instructions to help you tune your board to perfection. Kit includes: 10 in. file, edge tuning tool, wire file cleaning brush, metal scraper, 10 in. wax scraper, pocket stone, two pieces of Ptex, all-temp wax and a scuff pad.
short_description: The DAKINE Deluxe Tune Up kit features all the tools you need to keep your snowboard in top condition. Packed in a convenient carry case, this kit is perfect for both travel and at-home use.
